extensionDescription.message: LinkedIn Container isolescha tias activitads da LinkedIn dal rest da tias activitads en il web per evitar che LinkedIn ta fastizeschia ordaifer la website da LinkedIn cun agid da cookies da terzas partidas.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

in-fbc-subhead.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened into LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

in-fbc-p1.message: LinkedIn po ussa ta fastizar sin questa website. Per allontanar questa website da LinkedIn Container, tscherner Websites permessas en LinkedIn Container e l'allontanar da la glista.

on-facebook-subhead.message: Sin LinkedIn u websites isoladas da LinkedIn Container
on-facebook-subhead.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened into LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

on-facebook-p1.message: Questa icona cumpara en la trav d'adressas da Firefox cura che ti visitas websites che appartegnan a LinkedIn u websites che ti has agiuntà a LinkedIn Container.
on-facebook-p1.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop-up when the user is on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened into LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

on-facebook-p2.message: Questas websites ston acceder a tia identitad da LinkedIn (u savair tgi che ti es) per ch'ellas funcziunian. Quai vul era dir che LinkedIn po fastizar tut quai che ti fas sin questas websites.
on-facebook-p2.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop up when the user is on LinkedIn.

notOnLinkedInHeader.message: $URL$ na sa chatta betg en LinkedIn Container.
notOnLinkedInHeader.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is NOT on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened OUTSIDE LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

notOnLinkedInText.message: Questa website sa chatta ordaifer LinkedIn Container. Uschia èsi pli difficil per LinkedIn da ta fastizar en il web.
notOnLinkedInText.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop-up when the user is NOT on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened OUTSIDE LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

onUnknownSiteHeader.message: Questa website n'è betg en LinkedIn Container.
onUnknownSiteHeader.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on an "unknown" website - e.g., about:newtab. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

facebookContainer.description: This is the name of the extension, and appears at the top of all onboarding panels. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container".

onboarding1-subhead.description: This is the subhead of onboarding panel 1. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding1-p1.message: LinkedIn po fastizar tia navigaziun lunsch ordaifer LinkedIn.com. Ils buttuns per favurisar e cundivider, per exempel, pon registrar nua che ti es stà – perfin sin paginas nua che ti has mai duvrà ils buttuns.
onboarding1-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of onboarding panel 1. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding1-p2.message: LinkedIn Container creescha ina barriera tranter websites da LinkedIn ed il rest dal web. Uschia èsi pli difficil per LinkedIn da ta persequitar online.

onboarding2-subhead.message: Sin LinkedIn e las websites isoladas da LinkedIn Container
onboarding2-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the second onboarding panel. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding2-alt.message: L'icona da saiv da LinkedIn Container
onboarding2-alt.description: This is alternative text for the icon in the second onboarding panel

onboarding2-p1.message: Questa icona cumpara en la trav d'adressas da Firefox sche ti visitas websites (sco LinkedIn.com) che vegnan isoladas da LinkedIn Container.
onboarding2-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the second onboarding panel.

onboarding2-p2.message: Questas websites ston acceder a tia identitad da LinkedIn (u savair tgi che ti es) per ch'ellas funcziunian. Quai vul era dir che LinkedIn po fastizar tut quai che ti fas sin questas websites.
onboarding2-p2.description: This is the second paragraph of the second onboarding panel. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding4-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding4-p1.message: Perfin cura che ti n'es betg sin LinkedIn, po LinkedIn ta persequitar online. Buttuns che ta permettan da publitgar rauba sin LinkedIn u s'annunziar sin websites cun tes conto da LinkedIn, cuntegnan fastizaders. LinkedIn Container vegn a bloccar quests fastizaders e mussar l'icona da la saiv per ta mussar nua che fastizaders èn vegnids allontanads.
onboarding4-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding4-img.message: Quest maletg demonstrescha co che l'icona da saiv da LinkedIn Container vegn a cumparair entaifer ina pagina dasper in buttun per favurisar da LinkedIn.
onboarding4-img.description: This is alternative text for the image shown in the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-subhead.message: S'annunziar cun LinkedIn sin autras websites
onboarding5-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-p1.message: Per acceder ad autras websites cun tes conto da LinkedIn, las stos ti spustar en il container. Clicca sin l'icona da saiv e tscherna sutvart «Autorisar la website en LinkedIn Container».
onboarding5-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-img.message: Quest maletg demonstrescha co ch'il buttun per agiuntar ina website a LinkedIn Container vegn a cumparair en la panela.
onboarding5-img.description: This is alternative text for the image shown in the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-p2.message: Quai ta permetta da s'annunziar cun LinkedIn, ma LinkedIn po uschia fastizar tias activitads sin questa website.
onboarding5-p2.description: This is the second paragraph on the fifth onboarding panel.

btn-allow.description: This is a button to allows users to whitelist the domain, adding it to the LinkedIn container.

btn-cancel.description: This is a button to cancel out of the onboarding panel.

btn-next.description: This is a button to continue to the next onboarding panel.

btn-back.description: This is a button that returns the user to the previous onboarding panel.

btn-done.description: This is a button the user clicks to close out the panel when they have finished reading the text.

btn-arrow-back.description: This is alternative text for the back arrow button.

btn-arrow-forward.description: This is alternative text for the arrow icon next to the "How LinkedIn Container Works" link

no-trackers-subhead.message: Na chattà nagins fastizaders da LinkedIn

no-trackers-p1.message: LinkedIn Container n'ha chattà nagins fastizaders da LinkedIn sin questa pagina. Ma la pagina po tuttina cuntegnair fastizaders dad in auter tip.

learn-more.description: This is a link that opens a page with more information about LinkedIn Container.

how-fbc-works.description: This is a button that opens the LinkedIn Container onboarding flow.

trackers-detected-subhead.message: Nus avain ta protegì da LinkedIn.
trackers-detected-subhead.description: This is a subhead, and it means that the add on has protected the user by blocking LinkedIn trackers.

trackers-detected-p1.message: Ils buttuns da LinkedIn che cumparan sin websites da butias, novitads e sin autras paginas, cuntegnan fastizaders che tradeschan a LinkedIn las paginas che ti has visità en il web. Perfin sche ti n'utiliseschas mai quests buttuns per favurisar u cundivider, pon ils fastizaders rimnar datas davart tia navigaziun. LinkedIn Container blochescha quests fastizaders.

trackers-detected-p2.message: LinkedIn Container blochescha quests fastizaders. Sche ti cliccas dentant sin in da quests buttuns, po LinkedIn tuttina ta fastizar.

trackers-detected-fence-alt.message: Saiv da LinkedIn Container cun scut.
trackers-detected-fence-alt.description: This is alternative text describing the container fence icon.

sites-included.description: This is a header for the list of websites that are in the LinkedIn Container by default. Capitalized letters are preferred if that makes sense/is feasible for the language.

no-sites-added.description: This message is shown beneath the 'SITES YOU’VE ALLOWED' list header when no sites have been added to the contaner.

sites-allowed.description: This is the header for the list of sites the user has manually added into the LinkedIn Container. Capitalized letters are preferred if that makes sense/is feasible for the lanaguage.

sites-added-p1.message: LinkedIn Container isolescha las websites che appartegnan a LinkedIn en ina zona delimitada. Ti pos permetter ad ulteriuras websites l'access a quest container, ma quai permetta a LinkedIn da registrar dapli da tia navigaziun en il web.

button-allow-site.message: Permetter la website en LinkedIn Container
button-allow-site.description: Button text that allows sites to be added to the LinkedIn Container

button-remove-site.message: Allontanar la website da LinkedIn Container
button-remove-site.description: Button text that removes an already-added site from the LinkedIn Container to the default container

button-remove-site-tooltip.message: Perquai ch'i sa tracta dad ina website che appartegna a LinkedIn, èsi impussibel da l'allontanar da LinkedIn Container.
button-remove-site-tooltip.description: Tooltip that is displayed when hovering over the remove site button

remove-site-subhead.message: Allontanar la website da LinkedIn Container?

remove-site-p1.message: Sche questa website vegn allontanada da LinkedIn Container, na funcziuna l'annunzia cun LinkedIn betg pli e cookies da LinkedIn che fastizeschan vegnan stizzads.

remove-site-p2.message: Sche ti vul puspè duvrar la funcziun d'annunzia da LinkedIn, stos ti agiuntar danovamain la website a LinkedIn Container.

add-site-subhead.message: Permetter a LinkedIn da fastizar sin questa website?

add-site-p1.message: Quai ta pussibilitescha da s'annunziar cun LinkedIn, ma permetta a LinkedIn da registrar tge che ti fas sin questa website.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-share.message: LinkedIn Container ha deactivà quest buttun ed impedì che LinkedIn fastizeschia tia visita sin questa pagina.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-login.message: LinkedIn Container ha bloccà fastizaders da LinkedIn. Sche ti utiliseschas la funcziun d'annunzia da LinkedIn sin questa website, po LinkedIn ta fastizar.

inPageUI-tooltip-prompt-p1.message: Permetter a LinkedIn da ta fastizar qua?

inPageUI-tooltip-prompt-p2.message: Sche ti vul utilisar la funcziun d'annunzia da LinkedIn, po LinkedIn fastizar tias activitads sin questa website. Quai als po gidar da sa far in maletg pli cumplet da tia vita en l'internet.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-share-passive.message: Sche ti cliccas sin quest buttun, po LinkedIn fastizar tia visita sin questa website.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-email.message: Sche ti utiliseschas qua tia dretga adressa dad e-mail, po LinkedIn eventualmain ta fastizar. Clicca per vegnir a savair dapli.

inPageUI-tooltip-email-prompt-p1.message: Permetter a LinkedIn da ta fastizar qua?

inPageUI-tooltip-email-prompt-p2.message: Questa website po cundivider tia adressa dad e-mail cun LinkedIn. Quai permetta a LinkedIn da ta fastizar. Utilisescha in servetsch sco Firefox Relay per zuppentar tia dretga adressa dad e-mail.
